    The SSBSE is the premier international research symposium on Search-based Software Engineering.

    SSBSE'17 will be hosted in Paderborn, Germany, September 09-11.

    The conference will be co-located with FSE'17

    Important Dates
    Feb14: Tutorial Proposals
    Feb28: Tutorials Selected

    Submission
    Mar31: Abstracts
    Apr07: Papers
    May10: Notification
    Jun07: Camera Ready

    Submission
    May21: Short Papers
    May21: Student Papers
    May25: Challenge Track
    Jun04: Notification
    Jun11: Camera Ready

    Jun11: Author Registration
    Jul09: Early Registration

    Invitation to sponsor SSBSE'17

    SSBSE is the premier international research symposium on Search-based Software Engineering.

    Benefits and prices for four support levels are listed in the table below. Additional benefits or support levels may be negotiated. Please contact the general chair Lars Grunske.
